name: devops-resume-repo
description: Phase 1: Preparation & GitHub SetupThis phase sets up your code base and secures your infrastructure state.Step 1: Create the Repository Structure (Local Machine & GitHub)Go to GitHub: Open your browser and navigate to https://github.com/new.Create Repo: Give your repository a professional name (e.g., devops-resume-repo). Choose Public visibility.Clone Locally: On your computer, open your terminal (Command Prompt/PowerShell/Terminal) and run:Bashgit clone https://github.com/your-username/devops-resume-repo.git cd devops-resume-repo Create Folders: Inside the new folder, create the required structure using your terminal:Bashmkdir src terraform .github mkdir .github/workflows mkdir terraform/modules mkdir terraform/modules/static-app Result: You now have the skeleton structure ready for code.
